worklogs.comment:
liurenjie1024 opened a new pull request #2269: ARROW-2852: [Rust]Make Array sync and send
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2269
 
 
   Mark array as Sync and Send would be useful for multithread processing. It's also safe since they have no interior mutability.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description: Since arrays are immutable containers, it would be safe to mark it as Sync and Send. This is useful for processing in multithread environments.
fields.summary: [Rust] Mark Array as Sync and Send
